languages.text: "Сердца же тех, кто вынужден защищаться, кутаются в пурпурно-черную скорбь, однако слова их прозрачны, словно лед с ледниковых вершин. Но простолюдины всегда глухи к чужим страданиям, такова их природа. Вмешиваться в их дела едва ли достойно нас с вами, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Сердца же тех, кто вынужден защищаться, кутаются в пурпурно-черную скорбь, однако слова их прозрачны, словно лед с ледниковых вершин. Но простолюдины всегда глухи к чужим страданиям, такова их природа. Вмешиваться в их дела едва ли достойно нас с вами, {name}".

languages.text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Сердца же тех, кто вынужден защищаться, кутаются в пурпурно-черную скорбь, однако слова их прозрачны, словно лед с ледниковых вершин. Но простолюдины всегда глухи к чужим страданиям, такова их природа. Вмешиваться в их дела едва ли достойно нас с вами, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to other people's suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

"As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to other people's suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

"As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

"As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

"As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

languages.text: 「かたや自分たちの身を守ろうとしている者たちは黒紫色の嘆きに覆われていますが、発する言葉は氷山の頂にある氷ほど透明です。ですが、一般市民には他者の苦難は聞こえないもの。それが彼らの性質です。彼らの問題に介入するのは、あなたにとってもあたくしにとっても利はありません、{name}様」
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「かたや自分たちの身を守ろうとしている者たちは黒紫色の嘆きに覆われていますが、発する言葉は氷山の頂にある氷ほど透明です。ですが、一般市民には他者の苦難は聞こえないもの。それが彼らの性質です。彼らの問題に介入するのは、あなたにとってもあたくしにとっても利はありません、{name}様」

languages.text: “至于那些不得不想办法自卫的人，他们的内心被紫黑色的悲伤所笼罩，但他们的话语却像冰川顶部的坚冰一样剔透。然而，普通人总是对别人的痛苦充耳不闻，因为这是他们的本性。{name}，他们的事务并不值得你我进行干涉。”
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “至于那些不得不想办法自卫的人，他们的内心被紫黑色的悲伤所笼罩，但他们的话语却像冰川顶部的坚冰一样剔透。然而，普通人总是对别人的痛苦充耳不闻，因为这是他们的本性。{name}，他们的事务并不值得你我进行干涉。”

languages.text: «A los corazones de aquellos que se han visto obligados a defenderse, en cambio, los invade un dolor de color violáceo, pero sus palabras son tan transparentes como el hielo que yace en la cima de un glaciar. Sin embargo, los plebeyos siempre hacen oídos sordos al sufrimiento ajeno, pues tal es su naturaleza. Interferir en sus asuntos no es digno ni de usted ni de mí, {name}».
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «A los corazones de aquellos que se han visto obligados a defenderse, en cambio, los invade un dolor de color violáceo, pero sus palabras son tan transparentes como el hielo que yace en la cima de un glaciar. Sin embargo, los plebeyos siempre hacen oídos sordos al sufrimiento ajeno, pues tal es su naturaleza. Interferir en sus asuntos no es digno ni de usted ni de mí, {name}».

languages.text: « Quant aux cœurs de ceux qui ont dû se battre pour survivre, ils sont cramoisis de chagrin, mais leurs mots sont aussi limpides que la glace au sommet d'un iceberg. Malheureusement, le bas peuple est toujours aveugle aux souffrances des autres ; c'est dans sa nature. Nous ne devrions pas nous sentir {mf|concernés|concernées} par ces bagatelles, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Quant aux cœurs de ceux qui ont dû se battre pour survivre, ils sont cramoisis de chagrin, mais leurs mots sont aussi limpides que la glace au sommet d'un iceberg. Malheureusement, le bas peuple est toujours aveugle aux souffrances des autres ; c'est dans sa nature. Nous ne devrions pas nous sentir {mf|concernés|concernées} par ces bagatelles, {name}. »

languages.text: "Und die Herzen jener, die gezwungen wurden, sich zu verteidigen, sind umhüllt von violett-schwarzer Sorge, aber ihre Worte sind so durchsichtig wie das Eis auf einem Gletscher. Aber das gemeine Volk ist immer taub für das Leid anderer, das liegt in seiner Natur. Eine Einmischung in seine Angelegenheiten ist Eurer oder meiner nicht wert, {name}."
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Und die Herzen jener, die gezwungen wurden, sich zu verteidigen, sind umhüllt von violett-schwarzer Sorge, aber ihre Worte sind so durchsichtig wie das Eis auf einem Gletscher. Aber das gemeine Volk ist immer taub für das Leid anderer, das liegt in seiner Natur. Eine Einmischung in seine Angelegenheiten ist Eurer oder meiner nicht wert, {name}."

languages.text: "Kendilerini savunmak zorunda kalanların yürekleriyse morumsu siyah bir hüzne bürünmüş lakin sözleri bir buzulun tepesindeki buz kadar şeffaf. Gerçi avam, başkalarının acılarına hep kulak tıkar. Tabiatları böyledir. Aralarındaki meseleye müdahil olmak ikimizin de zamanına değmez {name}."
languages.original_text: "As for the hearts of those who have been forced to defend themselves, they are shrouded in purplish-black grief, but their words are as transparent as the ice that lies at the top of a glacier. But commoners are always deaf to others' suffering, for such is their nature. Interfering in their affairs is hardly worthy of you or me, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Kendilerini savunmak zorunda kalanların kalpleri ise kederli bir morumsu siyahlığa bürünmüş ama sözleri bir buzulun en tepesindeki buz kadar transparan. Sıradan insanlar her zaman başkalarının acılarına kulak tıkarlar, doğaları bu şekildedir. Aralarındaki meseleye müdâhil olmak ne senin zamanına ne benim zamanıma değer {name}."
